1.details: 1. Create .gitignore files for both main website and admin portal. 2. Clean up any sensitive files. 3. Ensure proper project structure.

2.content: Create GitHub repository and push code
2.details: 1. Initialize git repositories for both projects. 2. Add, commit, and push code to GitHub. 3. Create repository with proper README files.

3.details: 1. Connect GitHub repository to Vercel. 2. Configure build settings for both main site and admin portal. 3. Set up environment variables in Vercel.

4.details: 1. Configure blueoxjobs.eu for main website. 2. Configure admin.blueoxjobs.eu for admin portal. 3. Set up DNS records in Namecheap. 4. Verify SSL certificates.

5.details: 1. Test main website functionality on blueoxjobs.eu. 2. Test admin portal on admin.blueoxjobs.eu. 3. Verify database connectivity and all features work in production.
